title: Columbia Coding App
blog_text: A mobile app that will send you notifications whenever you have a class.

title: Fitness Tracker Pro
blog_text: A comprehensive mobile application that allows users to track their workouts, monitor their diet, and analyze their overall fitness progress with detailed reports and personalized tips!

title: Eco-Friendly Home
blog_text: An innovative platform that provides homeowners with tips, resources, and tools to make their homes more eco-friendly. Track energy usage, find sustainable products, and get personalized recommendations to reduce your carbon footprint!
